thread.section_title: LightInTheBox 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 LightInTheBox 的点评意见 | www.lightinthebox.com | 368 3
thread.title: Tommy Stocker
thread.title_full: LightInTheBox 的点评人 Tommy Stocker

author: Tommy Stocker
title: Tommy Stocker
text:
I have been dealing with Light in the box for over 3 years and found them easy to deal with
A fast shipping service and good quality products
my only criticism would be the amount of emails that are sent to me
but I'm sure If I asked they would cut down
PS If ordering a shirt make sure you order at least 2 sizes bigger
regards tommy
